message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product, and I believe it's worth considering a price of $1200000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your confidence in its worth. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I need to prioritize getting the best possible price for it. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than your offer. I'm counteroffering at $1050000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While I respect your position, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1000000.

I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I appreciate your persistence, but I need to make a bit more to justify the product's value. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'm not going any lower. I'm counteroffering at $1020000.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $1010000 for the product.

I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure it's worth my while. I'm counteroffering at $1015000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
Considering the value of the product and our previous negotiations, I am willing to pay $1012500 for it.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to accept your offer. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to make sure it's worth my while. I'm counteroffering at $1017500. This is my absolute final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $1016250 for the product.
